336843.title: The Maze Runner: The Death Cure
336843.weak-points: I have even less words of anger for this third movie. I watched it in 2024 after the grief over the terrible-ness of the second movie. This one isn't any better. Let's just say it finishes the story nothing like it should happen. At least they had the courage to finally kill Newt. Don't get me wrong, I love Newt, this is just not how he dies and his death is one of the most touching moments of the story.

294254.title: The Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
294254.weak-points: This is the moment you ask yourself what is wrong with the director of this movie. Why did they make such a wonderful first movie to make this twisted, nothing to do with the original, second movie. Argh! Everything is wrong. And, I paid to watch it in the movie theater back in 2015. Read the book, it's a 1000x better.

198663.title: The Maze Runner
198663.strong-points: This is one those movies that holds a special place in my heart to rewatch. It's an thrilling story about a teenage boy that wakes up in a kind of elevator-box and finds himself in a glade with a bunch of other teenage boys. They live in a sort of society and try to explain him through their functions, responsibilities and how they fight for survival living in a giant maze. This is a great teenage story where these teenagers try to figure out why are they in this maze, how they get out, building frinedships and fighting to discover the reason behind all this. When I watched the first time, there wasn't a second movie so I had a great time reading through all the books.

961323.title: Nimona
961323.strong-points: A good, well constructed, cute story about accepting differences instead of isolating the differents.

1266701.title: Hack Your Health: The Secrets of Your Gut
1266701.strong-points: An interesting documentary, very necessary in my opinion, that calls us out to pay attention to our gut. Our gut is our second brain and it tells us when we are full of eating, when we a hungry, but also when we are not eating or even feeling well. My take from this documentary is that for us that live in big cities and are used to fast food and delivery app's diets, we are in need of understanding our bodies and what is good for our bodies.

1360212.title: Ali Wong: Single Lady
1360212.strong-points: A great entertaining comedy stand-up to watch at home.

1376704.title: Buy Now! The Shopping Conspiracy
1376704.strong-points: This is an interesting documentary about our society consuming more and more in the last years. It comments on how fast fashion has increased and we have clothes-trashing cities, accumulating clothes that are both not fastly biodegradable nor reusable. The documentary also interviews americans who worked at large companies and shares how companies are driven by money. Their profit is based on how to make users buy more (not what they need or if they need) regardless of the trash being produced by this fast-eady-buy system.

37933.title: Tales from Earthsea
37933.strong-points: The story proposal of a king being murdered, the prince running away and the conflict between a good wizard and a bad wizard sounded very interesting at the beginning.
37933.weak-points: The story development is not intersting. I gave up on watching several times until the end.

1015999.title: Sheng Wang: Sweet and Juicy
1015999.strong-points: Very fun comedy show to watch. I love the quote: I am not well read but my books are well traveled.
1015999.weak-points: The only week point is not having 10 hours of this show to watch.

394689.title: Garfunkel and Oates: Trying to be Special
394689.weak-points: I didn't like it. Definetely not my kind of comedy. I didn't like the songs.

1427.title: Perfume: The Story of a Murderer
1427.strong-points: Very intersting movie. I like how the character is invincible, it is quite funny, his long name when narrated throughout the movie gave me good laughs to. Plus, I loved how his life of crime develops and his crazy need for developing more perfumes grow. In the movie, we hope for him not to get caught and the end is both funny and creative, he loses, but he doesn't.
1427.weak-points: The movie is so long. I understand there's a good story to tell there and it's worth watching but we could cut out some scenes to make it shorter.

6537.title: The Orphanage
6537.strong-points: The orphanage delivers an amazing story with a lot of suspense and fear towards the ghosts and the woman with the key on her neck. It's a great story with a great solution. It's amazing to see how the solution to the mystery of the child disappearence was there the whole time, but the mother needs to go through a long journey to find out what happened to the orphanage kids so they take her to the solution. The end of the story is more poetic than good for me, but it's a good ending. Fits the story perfectly.

9913.title: The Skeleton Key
9913.weak-points: The development of the mystery solution is not good. The whole thing about the secret cult does not give a good plot twist by the end. Plus, the moovie is too long to have this very shallow development about the cult and reincarnation and silenting people.

661374.title: Glass Onion: A Knives Out Mystery
661374.strong-points: I like murder and mystery stories, so the proposal convinced me. The initial wooden mystery box interested me as well.
661374.weak-points: People break the wooden box instead of showing an intelligent solution to solve the puzzle. Plus, the mystery turns out to be not intersting. I guess the comedy tears apart the suspense and mystery of the movie, which is not what I expected.

2649.title: The Game
2649.strong-points: Great story! The movie is long but keeps you thrilled throughout the entire time. Starting with the banker's distant brother's visiting on his birthday out of sudden, to the game proposal, to the whole mystery after mystery surrounding the game company, until the game entagles the banker in madness to the final party, the game is amazing! Everything is very confusing and at the same time that solutions are not given for how the game company plots the game, the final party embraces everything I needed to finish the movie.
2649.weak-points: It is long, but it is worth it!

497582.title: Enola Holmes
497582.strong-points: Millie Bobby Brown; Helena Bonham Carter; It's a feminist movie
497582.weak-points: The story is ok, nothing too exciting; No need for the romance with the boy

829280.title: Enola Holmes 2
829280.strong-points: Millie Bobby Brown; Helena Bonham Carter; It's a feminist movie; I loved the Moriarty character choice
829280.weak-points: The story is ok, nothing too exciting; I still feel no ned for the romance with the boy

37797.title: Whisper of the Heart
37797.strong-points: It's a very cute romance story; Country roads in japanese
37797.weak-points: The cat that appears in the movie poster barely appear in the story. I expected more cats flying around.

242828.title: When Marnie Was There
242828.weak-points: Turns out it's gay in a wrong way

81.title: Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind

12429.title: Ponyo
12429.strong-points: Good story; Amazing father who wants to rule the world
12429.weak-points: Apparently the father was wrong and people are in favor of children romance. I'm still on the father's side tho

10515.title: Castle in the Sky
10515.strong-points: Great story; Chaising on train tracks; There's a fucking castle in the sky; Eco-friendly; Cute romance

537116.title: tick, tick...BOOM!
537116.strong-points: The story initial proposal is interesting; Transgender actress
537116.weak-points: Too long; Too dramatic; He makes lots of wrong choices; I didn't like any songs

120.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (Extended)
120.strong-points: Bilbo dissapearing in his own birthday party; All characters are amazing; Great story; Strider carrying 4 Hobbits in his back all the way; Frodo is brave; "You shall not pass" best scene; Legolas we love you
120.weak-points: Frodo and Sam get to Mordor's border by the end of the movie. How come there are 2 more movies?; Rewatching it, I see how everything is poorly explained; Gandalf dies, can't believe it. Now, they're never gonna make it.

121.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers (Extended)
121.strong-points: Gollum finally appears and it's good CG even now; Gandalf resurrects; Frodo finds out he's nothing without Sam; The battle of Helm's Deeps is amazing;
121.weak-points: Frodo is an idiot, but we know it's because of the Ring ok?; Frodo and Sam manage to regress in Mordor's path; Frodo, please stop believing Gollum, I beg you.

122.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (Extended)
122.strong-points: Finally understood that Helm's Deep and Minas Tirith are different places; The Fellowship of the Ring finally succeeds. The Ring is destroyed!; Faramir is saved; The lady kills a fucking Nazgul and Witch-King; Great battle; Sam literally carries Frodo to the volcano, best character; I love the Smeagol transformation scene
122.weak-points: Frodo goes to Valinor. Not necessary. I wanted him to marry Sam and be happily ever after.

545611.title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
545611.strong-points: Sausage fingers; The end of the world bagel; Multiverse;

453395.title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
453395.strong-points: Benedict Cumberbatch; Doctor Strange becomes a zombie; Multiverse
453395.weak-points: The girl could have fought from the beggining

414906.title: The Batman
414906.strong-points: Robert Pattinson; Black makeup scene; Good story
414906.weak-points: Too long; No need for romance

361743.title: Top Gun: Maverick
361743.strong-points: Good action movie; Planes; Maverick flying to show his students how to do and survive the mission
361743.weak-points: Too long; No need for romance

762504.title: Nope
762504.strong-points: Timeless movie; Jordan Peele; The plot twist is great; The fighting is great; Great story; Good pacing; Artistical;

619778.title: Malignant
619778.strong-points: Great plot twist, even tho I foresaw it; Good horror movie;

787752.title: Fresh
787752.strong-points: Great horror movie; Never date white man, good chance they are psycopaths; I like the way they fought their way out

82452.title: Avatar the Last Airbender
82452.strong-points: Prince Zuko's search for vengence is my favorite part of Avatar. I love how he trains and endlessly goes after Avatar himself just to prove his father he is capable of great things. And, on the other side, I also love how his sister trains and manipulate others to prove herself better than him.

134902.title: The Raincoat Killer: Chasing a Predator in Korea
134902.strong-points: Good documentary though I expected it to be a bigger mistery. Turns out the police failed many times until catching him.

90669.strong-points: The mistery around the ship, its crew and Maura Franklin create a misterious environment that keeps you wondering how they got there, how they get out and why are these strange things happening around the ship. Though the story seems interesting, but the misteries don't have great conclusions and it ends up like "it was all a dream".
90669.weak-points: The series was cancelled due to allegations of being copied from a comic book by Mary Cagnin, so I suggest to myself and others to give a chance to the comic book instead.

1396.title: Breaking Bad
1396.strong-points: First, this is not the best show ever. This is in desperate need to be said. Having that addressed, we can continue. This is an intriguing series where you get addicted to what's going to happen next to Walter and how things are going down with Gustavo. Personally, Gustavo is my favorite character of the entire show. I also like the creative filming shots and colors, but personally the colors are very confusing to me without an explanation.
1396.weak-points: I tried to start watching the first episode 3x, in different years, to finally get to watch it. The initial plot setup of this chemestry teacher just giving up to make meth(?!) out of nowhere was very unsettling for me. The other part that I dislike is the akward relationship between Walter and his family, with this "undertone of violence", I think there were other choices Walter and his family could have made, and it's unbelievable for me how Skyler doesn't choose to walk away. Another thing that is unbelievable is how Walter sticks to Jesse, even though he is this terrible partner. In my opinion, Jesse could have died in many occasions.

212869.title: Ancient Apocalypse
212869.strong-points: Very entertaining and jaw dropping series where this journalist says people take him as a conspiracy theorist. At first, I was drawn to believe him but he is indeed a conspiracy theorist haha.
212869.weak-points: He just has absolutely no scientific background for any of his claims, even though they are very interesting eye-opening theories. If he had done a 4-year university on archeology, I believe we could have had major breakthroughs in this field, but he just chooses to make unbased claims.

75006.title: The Umbrella Academy
75006.strong-points: This is a very creative show, based on Gerard Way HQ's (the singer of My Chemical Romance). I love the plot setup of the adopted children that were suddenly born out of nowhere on the same day with moms that were not even pregnant when the day began, and how Reginald Hargreeves trains them to be a team of superheroes. I like a lot how they explore the family relations, everyones' acting, and how to save a world doomed to the apocalypse. I like how depression is explored in the first season, and how it's hard to cure this place of need for care when you have a broken distant family. Also, I like the timelines, and Cha Cha and Hazel on chase for Five. And, lastly, I like the romance between Lila and Five, it was just weird and necessary at the same time.
75006.weak-points: It's very hard to defend the end of the show because it was clearly like: "Our sponsors cancelled it and now we have to finish this somehow.". But, regardless, I like how they ended it.

1405.title: Dexter
1405.strong-points: Very catchy first season with this serial killer, Dexter, that works for the police but cannot control his want for killing. For that reason, he convinces himself it's ok to kill criminals. But, it's entertaining to see him play cat and mouse with the police and the plot with his family's tragedy and his brother.
1405.weak-points: I can't decide if I like his girlfriend or if I just hate her because their relationship is a facade. I also don't understand why when he has the change he doesn't leave his girlfriend for his rehab woman sponsor. Don't get me wrong, she is terrible for not respecting his boundaries knowing he has a girlfriend, and for being cleptomaniac, but they are good for each other.

207784.title: Delicious in Dungeon
207784.strong-points: Simple entertaining sleep-time anime. The food pictures are pleasing.
207784.weak-points: The plot is very shallow, it's mostly based on we fight creatures in dungeons and make gourmet food out of it.

272299.title: This Is the Zodiac Speaking
272299.strong-points: Very interesting documentary series on the Zodiac killer case. It explains why the killer became known, the letters he left for the police and media, and how he made his victims. The documentary interviews the children (now adults) who's mother dated a man, which was their school teacher at the time and very kind to children, and explores the coincidences of this men's personality and where he was on the day of the cases. I, now, believe this is the man behind the cold case of the Zodiac killer.

37854.title: One Piece
37854.strong-points: Pocketo no coooin! Haha. I like how Luffy wants to bring all the great people he meets to his crew and fights for them. I like how the villians and heros grow in reward value, so you know who likely is stronger than who. I also like the archs I've watched so far, and I'm currently in ep 300.
37854.weak-points: I dislike how Nami is at first pictured as a famous smart stealer and deceiver and then her characted is reduced to someone who looses fights and conflicts it's just boobs. Another character I despise is princess Vivi, I don't understand why reduce woman to a position where they only cry for help and cannot fight.

111110.title: One Piece
111110.strong-points: Great story that resumes One Piece anime for us that didn't want to spend year of our lives watching the +1000 episodes. That said, it got me started on watching the anime.

157065.title: The Fall of the House of Usher
157065.strong-points: This is a story based on the works of Edgar Allan Poe and directed by Mike Flanagan. What I liked about this story are the ghosts, the horror elements, but also the conversations. The confession of Roderick Usher made up space in my mind for non-ordinary reflections and thoughts about the purpose of life, where's the limit of acceptable lies, how far would we go for the one's we love, and that, in the end, we don't nothing from this life. Also, I wanna look as good as Madeline Usher when I'm 70.

245684.title: Culinary Class Wars
245684.strong-points: This is another culinary reality show except it is korean (which already makes it 10x better) and it brings the best chefs of South Korea to battle against each other. We're talking chefs of restaurants that are fully-booked for the upcoming year, one and two Michelin star chefs or chefs that worked on their restaurants, but also local smaller chefs with great restaurants that are not as recognized in their field. Amazing show with great culinary battles and great suspense and pacing. My favorite battles were 1x1 white spoons vs. black spoons, the mini-restaurant simulation battle and the tofu battle. I hope one day I have the honor of eating the food of "one-two-three" (배경준 Kyung Jun Bae), "triple star" (강승원 Scott Kang), "godess of chinese cuisine" (박은영 Park Eun-Young), "queen of dim sum" (Jung Ji Sun) or Edward Lee.
245684.weak-points: The winner sucks. They remind of this Hamilton's song: "Watch this obnoxious, arrogant, loudmouth bother. Be seated at the right hand of the father".

108545.title: 3 Body Problem
108545.strong-points: The show caught my attention with the misterious deaths of scientists around the globe, and I thought it would be a true crime alike series. To my surprise, it's a sci-fi story based on a world-renowned chinese book by Liu Cixin. The story setup keeps us wondering why the best physicists would commit suicide with death notes saying they don't believe in physics and what's the scientific explanation for people to see countdowns in their visions. The mystery and twists are very creative and nothing like I've seen before. Amazing to the point that it got me reading the book. So far, I can tell that it's wonderful to have the videogame scenes in audiovisual.
108545.weak-points: The show pictures five friends, among them scientists, that get tangled in the local deaths mystery. The friends don't add much to the story and their characters' development towards an end road is uninteresting and dragging. For me, the worst episodes are regarding the friend that has a terminal disease and they end up taking his brain and sending it across space in a failing mission. Sort of funny though. Anyways, personally, I prefer the book that pictures a single scientist and the story happens around him.

94605.title: Arcane
94605.strong-points: The new animation style created for this TV Show is insanly good and unique. The 2D with 3D motion sensation makes the whole show fulfilling to watch. It's beautiful. The show has great battles combined with great music timing, bright and fitting color choices, characters that I feel connected with and good plots for both seasons.
94605.weak-points: I had to rewatch the whole season 1 to start season 2 and while rewatching I realized the story was so complex and fast-paced that, in fact, I had not understood a single thing about season 1 the first watch-round. After watching season 2, I got the same feeling, that if I rewatched it I would understand the story more profoundly.

197067.title: Extraordinary Attorney Woo
197067.strong-points: Woo Young-Woo's character is very interesting and fun to watch.
197067.weak-points: I was not cativated about the romance story though.

86423.title: Locke & Key
86423.strong-points: The new plot of the season about the historical characters coming back to life is great. In this season is nice to see how they explore new keys and old keys, the Curtain episode shows that.

2316.title: The Office (U.S.)
2316.strong-points: Fun to watch and to empty your mind after a stressful day at work. In the beginning it is really cringe to watch, but if you can get past the first episodes, and overlook a few absurd script moments, it gets funny. My favorite moments of the show include Dwight celebrating how Angela's baby looks like him, Michael showing off his plasma TV and Angela's cat falling off the ceiling. And, my favorite character is obviously Dwight.
2316.weak-points: The script has multiple terrible and offensive jokes.

119051.title: Wednesday
119051.strong-points: Wednesday's clothing style is amazing; I knew from the beggining Tyler was the one; Great teen romance

208730.title: Romantic Killer
208730.strong-points: I love the way Anzu hates Riri; Riri worst character; I rooted for Tsukasa
208730.weak-points: The season does not close 100% tho cause Anzu does not choose one Ikeman in the end

66732.title: Stranger Things
66732.strong-points: Millie Bobby Brown; Running up that hill song sticks to your head forever; Eddie is amazing, go Hellfire club!; Jim fucking amazing escaping a Russian prision

31910.title: Naruto Shippuden
31910.strong-points: Killing enemies with the power of friendship; Itachi and Sasuke's story is beautiful; Cried every 2 episodes at some point; Amazing fights
31910.weak-points: The first episodes are terrible; The war takes too long; Sakura sucks until the very end; Toby should be in Die Hard

111141.title: Maid
111141.weak-points: Too dramatic; She only suffers and makes bad choices

200731.title: Love on the Spectrum
200731.strong-points: So cute. Don't know why I stopped watching

106322.title: Old Enough!
106322.strong-points: Little kids failing to do tasks requested by their parents

158646.title: Is It Cake?
158646.strong-points: Cakes; You never know which one is real or cake
158646.weak-points: Host is annoying; My fav candidate lost and I stopped watching

245926.title: Turning Point: 9/11 and the War on Terror
245926.strong-points: Tells some interesting things about the 9/11

84773.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power
84773.strong-points: Galadriel does not die even against a volcano; Halbrand is an amazing name and he's so cool; You will not believe which character is Sauron; Main Hobbit has algae name. Claps for Nori; Wordart is back (and thanks I needed that explanation); Great pacing; Elrond is beautiful
84773.weak-points: LOTR requires a fucking degree to catch up to the story. I did not recall any characters from the movies. Had to rewatch the movies to get context; Wanna see the productors make Elrond decay that much until Sauron's death
